title: ISweepFeatureData.SetWallThickness
description: Sets the wall thickness, forward (Direction 1) or reverse (Direction 2), of this thin-walled sweep feature.
signature:
void SetWallThickness( 
   System.Boolean
Forward
,
   System.Double
WallThickness
)

parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True for Direction 1, false for Direction 2 (see Remarks )

remarks:
This method:
is valid only if
ISweepFeatureData::IsThinFeature
is true.
sets the thickness in Direction 1 and Direction 2, depending on
ISweepFeaureData::ThinWallType
.
is not valid for swept-surface features.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
